title: Castlevania.Lords.of.Shadow.2.Repack-R.G. Mechanics

Castlevania.Lords.of.Shadow.2.Repack-R.G. Mechanics

Released: 2014 
Genre: Action, Slasher, 3D, 3rd Person 
Publication Type: Repack 
Platform: PC 
Language: RUS | ENG 
Voice set Language: ENG 
Tablet: CODEX / SKIDROW 


SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS 

Operating system: Windows XP Service Pack 3 / Windows 7 / Windows 8 
Processor: 2.4Ghz Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD equivalent 
Memory: 2 GB 
Video Card: Direct X9 compatible video card 512Mb RAM 
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX Ã‚Â® 9.0 
Free space on hard disk: 6.5 GB 


DESCRIPTION 
_______________ 
"He who fights with monsters will not be able to keep yourself to yourself  
do not become a monster." The first part of the saga of Castlevania: Lords 
of Shadow revealed the secret of the Belmont clan. In the continuation of 
the history you face new challenges and unexpected plot twists. In the 
final grand saga Dracula returns - weakened and eager to get rid of the 
shackles of immortality. However, a new threat will make a great vampire 
look for ways to regain their strength. The key to this - in his own castle. 
But do not hurry to write off the Belmont clan ... 


Game Features:

Sequel of the famous game created in 2010 in close cooperation with the fans. 
Get ready for an exciting new stories and new clashes with various opponents. 
Events Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2 begin immediately after the final of 
the first part - in the modern world, where the weakened Dracula seeks to get 
rid of his immortality. His longtime associate Sobek offers vampire to battle 
with Satan, who returned to the world to make a doomsday. 

World of Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2 has changed beyond recognition. Offers 
a huge area that you can learn as much as you want, gloomy city in the Gothic style, 
and countless enemies - powerful minions of Satan. 
Travel the open world, returning to previously explored places after gaining new 
abilities. Brand new mobile camera will allow you to explore all corners of the 
world and to fully enjoy the inimitable visual style Castlevania. 
Key elements of the combat system underwent a thorough revision. A variety of 
weapons has its own unique properties - for example, by Void Sword you can pull 
the life of the wounded opponents, and Chaos Claw breaks any protection. Besides 
Dracula becomes stronger through the blood of his enemies. Properly allocating 

Features RePack'a:

IncludesUpdate1 
Do not cut / recoded 
Crack the text from ZoG Forum Team v 1.1
